haxegui

http://code.google.com/p/haxegui/

  • haxegui.utils.Color: : HLS, HLV
  • haxegui.controls.UiList: ScrollBar, or maybe leave it out, and keep lists in a ScrollPane...
  • haxegui.controls.TreeNode: expand(), collapse()
  • haxegui.controls.Tree: all
  • haxegui.controls.ListItem: Add an ICellRenderer interface maybe?
  • haxegui.controls.ListHeader: Sharing single header among multiple lists, to create a multi-column datagrid like widget...
  • haxegui.controls.ITween: updateSizeTween
  • haxegui.controls.Component: rgb color transformation
